Evryone i have a FIX!
first you must download http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5291982/CXZ_Game_Engines_%5BMAC%5D. This is a CXZ Port that will allow you to run the game.

Once it has finished eject all mounted volumes and then open the dmg/zip/rar file again. Open FIFA 09 and it runs beautifully !

confirmed working on mac mini snow leopard with CXZ game engine. Just google it or smth and it should be fine.
